Nashwa Mustafa (amụrụ na 15 Ọktoba 1968), bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri El-Rehla, El-Farah, Maazị Shalsh's Family na Mahmoud the Egyptian
A mụrụ ya na 15 Ọktoba 1968 na Cairo, Egypt.
Ọ lụrụ Mohammed Emad, onye biri na USA ogologo oge
Otú ọ dị, ọ laghachiri Ijipt iji nwee agbamakwụkwọ okpukpe dịka ọdịnala ha si dị
Ha lụrụ na 1993 wee mụta ụmụ abụọ, Maryam na Abdulrahman
Nwa ya nwoke Abdulrahman lụrụ nwanyi na July 2019.
Ọ malitere ọrụ telivishọn ya na 1991 na usoro Conscience of Teacher Hikmat
Ọ mere ihe nkiri dika 'Abeer' na usoro ahụ
Mgbe ahụ na 1999, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri El-Farah
N'afọ 2001, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke Egypt Africano, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Zainab'
E wepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ ma mee ya na 11 Julaị 2001 na Egypt.
N'afọ 2013, ọ na-akwado ememe telivishọn Cash Taxi, nke bụ ụdị Egypt nke ihe ngosi egwuregwu mba ụwa nke Britain bụ Cash Cab (ihe ngosi egwuregwu Britain)
Ihe omume ahụ gosipụtara na MBC Masr.
N'afọ 2017, o mere ihe omume telivishọn Three in One N'afọ 2018, o mepụtara ihe nkiri Selfie Maʹa el-Mot, nke e mere na Miami Theatre
N'oge gara aga, a na-akpọ egwuregwu ahụ Selfie Maʹa Sayedna, mana emesịa gbanwee ya n'ihi ọrụ nke Ngalaba Nchịkwa Mgbasa Ozi.
